tasks.title: üìñ How to Use Mission Control
tasks.description:
Quick reference for using Mission Control with Dhombs.

**Workflow:**
1. Create tasks in Backlog
2. Move to 'In Progress' when ready
3. Dhombs works on it (or you do)
4. Move to 'Review' when done
5. Approve ‚Üí Done, or add feedback

tasks.title: üîß Build Engineer's Toolbox Web App
tasks.description:
Research and build a web-based calculation tool for engineering design.

**Coastal:**
- Breakwater (Hudson, Van der Meer)
- Revetment sizing
- Seawall overtopping (EurOtop)

**Structural:**
- RC beam design
- Column design

**Roads:**
- Asphalt pavement (AASHTO)
tasks.dod: Working web app with at least breakwater + overtopping calcs, deployed to GitHub Pages

comments.author: Dhombs
comments.text: Research saved to memory/learning/engineers-toolbox-research.md. Ready to start building MVP.

tasks.title: üîÑ Test NWD Merge Script
tasks.description:
Test the Navisworks merge automation script.

Script location: workspace/scripts/merge_nwd.py

Run with: python merge_nwd.py <folder>

tasks.title: üîó Set up OpenRouter for Multi-Model Access
tasks.description:
Configure OpenRouter to access Gemini, Grok, and other models.

1. Get API key from openrouter.ai
2. Run: openclaw onboard --auth-choice apiKey --token-provider openrouter --token <key>
3. Test with Gemini model

tasks.title: ‚òÅÔ∏è Set up Cloud Sync for Kanban
tasks.description:
Configure JSONBin cloud sync for the Kanban app so tasks sync between PC and phone.

1. Create account at jsonbin.io
2. Get API key
3. Open kanban Settings ‚Üí paste key
